xp.description: Gets the XP for a user. If no user is specified, the user who invoked the command will be used.

username.description: The username of the user to get XP for.

disableCommentPosting.description: Set to true to prevent XP updates from being posted back to GitHub.

disqualificationBanThreshold.description: Ban the user from the organization when their XP falls below this value after a disqualification.
